department.ch: 工業管理研究所碩士班

goal.ch: This course introduces fundamental topics in stochastic processes. These topics include renewal theory, Poisson processes, discrete time Markov chains, and continuous time Markov chains.
goal.en: This course introduces fundamental topics in stochastic processes. These topics include renewal theory, Poisson processes, discrete time Markov chains, and continuous time Markov chains.

outline.ch:
“課程簡介：以機率數量之方法描述與評估具有隨機性之系統〈如生產，製造，服務，通訊系統〉進而可設計系統與最佳化地運作該系統。
先修課程：工程統計或統計或機率論
課程內容：
1 Review: probability
2 Conditional probability and expectation
3 Conditional probability and expectation
4 Exponential distribution
5 Exponential distribution
6 Poisson process: introduction and examples
7 Poisson process: further properties and generalizations
8 Mid term
9 Continuous time Markov Chain: introduction and examples
10 Continuous time Markov Chain: birth and death process
11 Continuous time Markov Chain: limiting probabilities
12 Renewal theory: introduction and examples
13 Renewal theory: regenerative processes
14 Renewal theory: semi-Markov process
15 Queueing theory
16 Final exam
outline.en:
1 Review: probability
